TextView.android:text: WELCOME to the game of BookCricket

* Book Cricket is a two player game in which you can either play with CPU or with another player. 

* Click FLIP PAGE button or SWIPE the screen right to left to flip the pages and look for the page number. 

* The player should always look for the side of book which has even numbers on it. 

* In the opened page, look for the even number and take note of the last unit in that number. 

* For Example: If the opened page is 154, then the last unit is 4 so the score is 4. 

* So the possible scores are 2, 4, 6, 8 and 0. 

* 2, 4 and 6 score will be added to the player's score as such and 8 will be a dot ball. 

* 0 score means the batsman is out. 

* The innings will go on until all the wickets fall. 

* You can change maximum pages of the book and maximum wickets in hand through settings.
REJOICE YOUR CHILDHOOD MEMORIES WITH THIS EXCITING GAME. BEST OF LUCK!!
